name: Color Color!!!
description:
Absolutely simple and innovative & addictive mechanism!
Totally different dot-to-dot drawing game!
Easy-to-play gaming experience and just catch the perfect timing!
Watch out the red heart on the top and be the perfect master of timing!
More Perfect, More surprises!
Enjoy the awesome quality graphics and animations!

We are ready to make your game experience even greater!
Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better.
Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
